name: Ultimate Multiversal Combat League
description:
UMCL is a hybrid tabletop war-game supported by a software for two players.

Grab some minis digitalize them and see you on the battlefield.


This is a students project  & was created at the Game Design - UE Department of the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Git: https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/2021_ba_philipp_schmitz/src/master/
